qa_pairs.question: 1. Do you want to enable autoscaling for this application? (Controls whether the application automatically scales based on resource usage)
2. What container image do you want to use for this application? (Specifies the Docker image to run in the containers)
3. How many replicas of the application do you want to run? (Controls the number of instances of the application running)
4. What type of service do you want to expose for this application? (Specifies the type of Kubernetes service for accessing the application)
5. Do you want to use a specific service account for this application? (Specifies the service account used by the application)
